QuestData.Title: Scaling Ever Higher
QuestData.Description:
You there, outsider! You have killed proto dragons before, yes?
So it stands to reason that your experience combined with my hunting prowess, we can take down quite a few! There are springs around here that attract draconic beasts.
Help me prove to my foolish other half that I am the better hunter.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay hornswogs and territorial proto drakes with Toluiqi.
